Scripts.OnTextChanged:
local text = self:GetText()
if text == "0" then self:SetText("") end
self.Instructions:SetShown(text == "") NumericInputSpinner_OnTextChanged(self)
self:GetParent().SetRewardButton:UpdateButtonState()

local text = tonumber(self:GetText())
if text and text > HEADHUNTING_MAX_CONTRACT_GOLD_PER_KILL then self:SetText(HEADHUNTING_MAX_CONTRACT_GOLD_PER_KILL) end
InputBoxInstructions_OnTextChanged(self) self:GetParent().SetRewardButton:UpdateButtonState()
